audio_description: Today we are going to do a chicken dum biriyani. Its a very easy recipe. All of you might be knowing how to make biriyani. Those who are studying will need some tips. We are going to do a video like that. My video might be very long. So I shall try to make it as much as possible. We are going to do it with 1kg chicken. We have to marinate the chicken first. Then we shall do the rest.

audio_description: If you are using coriander leaves or mint leaves, use fresh ones. If you are using ginger garlic, use local ones. That way you will get the correct taste and smell of the biriyani. I have taken 14 pieces of this biriyani masala here. 4 cardamoms, 4 cloves, 1 small piece of cashew nuts. Never add more when taking cashew nuts. 1.25tsp will be enough.

audio_description: Do not let it burn while frying. If you add the cashew nuts, it will get burnt fast. Once it becomes hot, we shall keep it aside in this pan. Once it cools down, we shall grind it in the mixi. Do not keep it in the same pan after frying. Since it is hot, it may get burnt.

audio_description: Next we are going to fry some onions for this biriyani. For that I have cut 2 onions into thin slices. If you have a slicer, you can grate it and make it thin. Only then you can fry it well. If you want to avoid this stage, you can do it. You can even add 2 onions to the masala. But for this you can make a tastier biriyani. Heat 2-3 batches of oil and fry it.

Its better to remove it to a tissue.

Add little salt to this.

Before that we shall add 3tbsp grated coconut and 8-10 cashew nuts to the mixi and grind it. If you soak it in water for a while, it will be easy to grind it. Do not add more coconut while grinding. If you add more, the masala will be more.

audio_description: When you keep it on a low flame for 10-12 minutes,the steam will spread all over the biriyani and the sides will become dry. At that time switch off the gas. After 15-20 minutes we can break the dum. Now the biriyani has become a good dum. The steam has spread all over the biriyani. Now lets break the dum. It will be difficult to break it with your hands. So just hold the sides with a knife.
